com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.util

Interface IRenderer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICalendarEntryRenderer, IColumnHeaderRenderer, IDatelineRenderer<T>, IDragInfoRenderer, IDragRowRenderer, IEventlineObjectRenderer, ILayerContainerRowHeaderRenderer, IPopupRenderer, IRelationshipRenderer, IRowHeaderRenderer<T>, IRowRenderer, ITimelineObjectRenderer, ITreeTableCellRenderer, ITreeTableRowHeaderRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatelineRenderer, AbstractPopupRenderer, DefaultActivityObjectRenderer, DefaultCalendarEntryRenderer, DefaultCapacityObjectRenderer, DefaultColumnHeaderRenderer, DefaultDragInfoRenderer, DefaultDragRowRenderer, DefaultEventlineObjectRenderer, DefaultEventObjectRenderer, DefaultLayerContainerRowHeaderRenderer, DefaultPopupRenderer, DefaultRelationshipRenderer, DefaultResourceNodeRowHeaderRenderer, DefaultResourceRowRenderer, DefaultRowRenderer, DefaultTimelineObjectRenderer, DefaultTreeTableCellRenderer, DefaultTreeTableRowHeaderRenderer, MacColumnHeaderRenderer, MacLayerContainerResourceRowHeaderRenderer, MacLayerContainerRowHeaderRenderer, MacTimeGranularityDatelineRenderer, MacTreeTableRowHeaderRenderer, SimpleGranularityDatelineRenderer, TimeGranularityDatelineRenderer, TreeTable.BooleanRenderer, TreeTable.CalendarRenderer, TreeTable.ColorRenderer, TreeTable.DateRenderer, TreeTable.DoubleRenderer, TreeTable.EnumRenderer, TreeTable.IconRenderer, TreeTable.NumberRenderer, WeekendCalendarEntryRenderer

    public interface IRenderer
    A common base interface for all renderers used by FlexGantt.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
